column1: Happy #Thanksgiving! Many blessing to you and your families. I am grateful for my loving family and our great state. Don't forget to give thanks! https://t.co/RP2tswI7MN

Phone number to report irregularities: 888-630-1776.

The Trump campaign is looking for volunteers to help with the county canvasses to ensure the integrity of the election. They also have a phone number you can call to report any irregularities you have seen or heard about.  Volunteer for the canvass: https://t.co/sxk2PotFYy

There should always be transparency and fairness in the vote-counting process. Reports of irregularities should be investigated and people should feel confident their vote was fairly and accurately counted.

The Trump team is looking for County Canvassers to assist with any challenges across the state. If you are willing and able to assist and sign up for a shift please sign up here: https://t.co/R28okGpIp2
